body_html:
What was your learning rate? What kind of data are you feeding? Right now i'm doing similar changes to cifar10 model to my own 200x200 vegetation images classification. The datasets have some noise (mixed classes).

My model decreases from 11.6 loss to 3.6 loss after 2k, and then jumps to 300 at 3k and stabilizes at ~80.

My ILR is 0.07 and decay is also 0.07

My model decreases from 11.6 loss to 3.6 loss after 2k, and then jumps to 300 at 3k and stabilizes at ~80.
